posts.post_content:

1911 T3 Turkey Red Cabinets, #105 Hans Lobert

Back variation: Checklist with ordering information

Beautiful card with amazing color! It does have two very light wrinkles; one horizontal from name to left edge; one diagonal through border on bottom right corner.

Payment by cash, check, money order, or by Paypal (Regular PayPal only, not Gift/Friend & Family). PayPal to [url]KansasBaseball1957@yahoo.com[/url]
